info.title: PHPNuxBill Internal API
info.description:
Generated from `docs/api.md`.

This API is controller-based (not pure REST).
Legacy calls use `/system/api.php?r=<route>`; the OpenAPI spec uses PATH_INFO style `/system/api.php/<route>`.

servers.description: Common local Apache/XAMPP setup (adjust path if needed).

tags.name: whoami
tags.description: Core identity/permission endpoints implemented directly in `system/api.php`.

get.description:
Legacy route: `r=accounts/change-password`
Access: `customer`

Implementation notes:
- Legacy routing uses query param `r=...` on `/system/api.php`.
- OpenAPI paths map to PATH_INFO style `/system/api.php/<route>` (same handler).

Legacy route: `r=accounts/change-password-post`
Access: `customer`

Implementation notes:

- OpenAPI paths map to PATH_INFO style `/system/api.php/<route>` (same handler).

csrf_token.description: CSRF is bypassed when `isApi=true`; this field is ignored for API calls.
CSRF is bypassed when `isApi=true`; this field is ignored for API calls.

Returns identity + permissions for the current subject (admin/customer).
Returns identity + permissions + feature flags for the current subject (admin/customer).
Validates a legacy token. Requires `token` (admin/customer).
Returns admin identity for a valid admin token. Requires `token` (admin).

AdminApiKeyAlt.name: X-API-Key
AdminApiKeyAlt.description: Alias header for admin API key (legacy/compat).

LegacyTokenQuery.name: token
LegacyTokenQuery.description: Legacy token (admin/customer). Prefer admin API key headers for server-to-server.

TokenHeader.name: X-Auth-Token
TokenHeader.description: Optional header transport for legacy token (avoids putting tokens in URLs).
